wxString CStatTreeItemMaxConnLimitReached::GetDisplayString (  )  const [virtual]

Returns a string to be displayed on GUI.

For m_count == 0 it will display "Never", for other values it will display the counter value and the date & time of the event.

Reimplemented from CStatTreeItemBase.

References m_count, CStatTreeItemBase::m_label, and m_time.
